com.alexkasko.springjdbc.querybuilder
Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.springjdbc.querybuilder.QueryBuilder

public class QueryBuilder
extends Object

Builder class for string queries. Query is build from template - string with placeholder sections (clauses), and expressions (lists) set to to builder to fill clauses. Placeholder syntax: ${placeholder_42} Placeholder escaping syntax: {@code $${placeholder_42} (will NOT be parsed) Placeholder name must conform this regex: {@code [a-zA-Z_0-9]+}

Author:
alexkasko Date: 11/7/12
